name: Bottle Breaker Bonanza!
description:
Fulfill the innate human desire to break bottles in this short arcade shooter! 

Objective: Get as many points as you can before you Game Over!

-Shoot bottles to increase your score! 

-Shoot multiple bottles at once to raise your score faster!

-Don't let bottles fall off screen, they will decrease your health!

-No health means Game Over!

-You only have 6 bullets maximum so make sure to reload! 

Controls: Use your mouse!

-To Shoot: Left Click

-To Reload: Right Click or "r" on keyboard

-To Pause: "esc" or "p" on keyboard

-Watch Out! Bottles spawn faster and get smaller as time goes on!

Credits:

-“1911 Reload” free use sound by nioczkus on Pixabay

-“Gunner sound” free use sound by DeathMarty on Pixabay
